effect.sword_shield: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.
effect.legends_arceus: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn. If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned. This move’s chance of success halves every time it’s used consecutively with any other protection move.

short_effect.sword_shield: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.

flavor_text.sword_shield: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.
